title: Earn AWS certification as a cloud expert with this certification training package, now only $24.99
content:
Macworld

In the world of cloud computing, Amazon Web Services (AWS) remains the 800-pound gorilla that rules the kingdom. Responsible for providing cloud service solutions to businesses, government agencies, educational institutions and more, AWS holds over 41% of the cloud market, more than all these closest competitors like Microsoft, Google, and IBM combined.

With more than 1 million active accounts worldwide, you can become your own AWS guru with the training found in The 2024 AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner and Architect Certification Bundle, which is on sale now through January 14th at 11:59 PM PT. 

Featuring seven courses and almost 90 hours of intensive training, this coursework is designed to give learners all the background they need to take full advantage of all the cloud-based features available as an AWS user and earn certification as a true AWS expert.

If you’re looking for a career in cloud computing, whether you want to be an architect or a developer, there’s no better place to start than with AWS certification training, including hands-on, practical real-world labs to help you grasp all the basics. Then, you’ll be ready to sit for AWS certification exams that can open doors to all kinds of incredible professional opportunities.

Each of these 7 courses is a $60 value on its own, but as part of The 2024 AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner and Architect Certification Bundle, the complete package is available now through January 14th at 11:59 PM PT. for only $24.99.

 

The 2024 AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner & Architect Certification Bundle – $24.99

Get it for $24.99
